class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        points.sort()
        n = len(points)
        left = []
        right = []
        
        from sortedcontainers import SortedList
        t1 = SortedList()
        t2 = SortedList()
        for x, y in  points:
            t1.add(x-y)
            t2.add(x+y)
        
        ans = inf
        for x, y in  points:
            t1.remove(x-y)
            t2.remove(x+y)
            d = max(t1[-1] - t1[0], t2[-1] - t2[0])
            ans = min(ans, d)
            t1.add(x-y)
            t2.add(x+y)
        
        return ans
